export.description: Export files from Accent and write them to your local filesystem

order-by.name: order-by
order-by.description: Will be used in the export call as the order of the keys

jipt.description: Export jipt files from Accent and write them to your local filesystem

stats.description: Fetch stats from the API and display it beautifully

sync.description: Sync files in Accent and write them to your local filesystem

add-translations.name: add-translations
add-translations.description: Add translations in Accent to help translators if you already have translated strings

dry-run.name: dry-run
dry-run.description: Do not write the file from the export _after_ the operation

merge-type.name: merge-type
merge-type.description: Will be used in the add translations call as the "merge_type" param

order-by.name: order-by
order-by.description: Will be used in the export call as the order of the keys

sync-type.name: sync-type
sync-type.description: Will be used in the sync call as the "sync_type" param
